title: whenever I move an email to a folder, the inbox contents to the right of the folder pane automatically scrolls the next unread email to the top of the page with 115.2.0
content:
Just installed the 115.2.0 64-bit update on Thunderbird. Now, whenever I move an email to a folder, the inbox contents to the right of the folder pane automatically scrolls the next unread email to the top of the page. The causes me to have to scroll to get to the last email i was actually looking at. How do I stop this from occurring?

Thank you.
creator: stxwildcat

title: Problema con client posta thunderbirdsu pc
content: Buon pomeriggio, ho un problema con il programma di posta Mozilla Thunderbird. Questa mattina ho ricevuto su gmail una mail alle ore 8.38 ora italiana e così anche nell'app dello smartphone sistema android Bluemail. Sono andata a pc nel client thunderbird per rispondere, ma ancora adesso dopo molte ore la mail non è arrivata, non è nello Spam, in quelle Importanti, Tutti i messaggi. Per fortuna che avevo anche il cellulare, perchè altrimenti non mi sarei accorta di questa mail. Non utilizzo mai l'interfaccia gmail per il pc, ma solo Thunderbird. Non credo mi sia mai capitato. Mi potete aiutare per favore? Vi ringrazio di tutto. Franca
creator: fcaneve

title: Thunderbird crashing
content:
Yesterday morning I started getting the Mozilla Crash Reporter prompt that Thunderbird had a problem and crashed. It's still like that. A friend in New York experienced the same crashes, but her TB was only down for a few hours. I'm in the California Bay Area, if that means anything.

I'm hoping it's a Mozilla server problem that will be rectified soon.

Thanks,
creator: stevemc209

title: Four issues after installing TB on a new computer
content:
Hello,

I finally had to migrate my old Windows7 home computer to Windows10.

TB looks quite different from before.

After using Tools > Import to import the profile folder from the old computer, I'm having four issues:

1. For some reason, TB displays all the email accounts, although they're global: How can I get only the Thunderbird account to be displayed, like before?

2. When hitting F5 to connect and download emails from those different accounts, I'm prompted for their POP3 password. Why is that?

3. Windows won't let me unpin TB's icon in the taskbar. How can I remove it?

4. Is there a way to remove that empty space above?

Thank you.
creator: littlebigman

title: Open Calendar First By Default
content: Is there any way that when you first open Thunderbird, the Calendar can be the first tab displayed? My morning workflow is to review my calendar first and then move on to email. I would like to be presented with my calendar when I first open the app. Is there any way to make this happen? Thanks.
creator: rammjet

title: Gmail accounts all stopped working today
content:
I have been using TB for years with multiple gmail and other accounts. All of a sudden today I got this message: 

"The message could not be sent because connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com failed. The server may be unavailable or is refusing SMTP connections. Please verify that your Outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again."

I have looked up this topic here and checked all the 456/993 SMTP threads, but still it won't work. Also tried the allow cookies thing. Is there something I am missing? Thanks in advance!
creator: gezoeter

title: Add address to block list
content: With reference to Support (support.mozella.org page), I have completed setting up a block list (named Blocked) as per instructions. In the setup, I have a single address to be blocked, lets name it address1. I am having trouble adding additional addresses, address2, to my Blocked list. In the instructions, "you can add the person's address into the top of the filter by clicking on + button". Here is where I am having trouble, the exact steps to do that. I am interpreting the "you can add..." instruction to mean: open the new unwanted email, highlight and right click. The only filtering option is "Create Filter Form". Clicking on it opens the "Filter Rules". The targeted address, Address2, is in the first line of the "Match..." section, the "Filter name" is blank. At this point, if I input my "Blocked" in the "Block list" line, it responds "The filter name already exists...". If I click on a + as the instructions indicate, it just adds address2 into the second line, duplicating the first line. If I just click OK it creates another block list under the name of the targeted address, address2. Could you clarify what the procedure is to add addresses to a block list?
creator: jpfreem

title: Email password work, but under saved passwords its the wrong one.
content:
If one wants to save your passwords TB is good for that. However I noticed the saved passwords in TB were not correct. The email addressed work fine, so would seem I have the correct passwords. But the dates its shows updated is wrong and password is wrong. This is a GMAIL and Gmail will not allow a wrong password.

So something in TB is off. So recap: Email works fine. Saved passwords are not correct. Brings up a whole thing of how is it checking email with wrong passwords saved.

This has been and issue for awhile was hopeful a update would fix the bug. And yes, the PC has been restarted and cache removed. But the old passwords remain.
creator: douglascounty

title: update to 115 Supernova is empty page with menu and taskbar.  Could not see folders, nor address book, nor inbox messages for 5 accounts
content:
I was running TB 102.15 and I did an update which was to 115 supernova. When I opened the supernova application on my windows 10 desktop, I could not see folders, nor address book, nor inbox messages for any of my 5 emails that TB manages. It was an empty page with menu and taskbar only.

I actually was able to pull my old profile while under 102.15 from a cloud backup of idrive. I uninstalled supernova, saved and then deleted my thunder profile from "app data" (that supernova created), reinstalled 102.15, let it populate a new profile, copied the items IN my old profile (102.15) that was from idrive and pasted them in the new .default-release folder. Its running again. BUT..... I am now afraid what will happen when I HAVE TO update to supernova....what wouldn't my 102.15 profile just transfer over to 115 supernova?????
creator: angellea
